name: Paris
tagline: The romantic capital of the world.
description: Romantic city of lights, fashion, and croissants.
review: “Super easy booking experience. Highly recommend!”

name: Dubai
description: Luxurious city with modern architecture and desert safaris.
review: “Amazing place for luxury and adventure.”

name: Tokyo
description: A blend of tradition and technology, vibrant city life
review: “Incredible culture and food!”

name: New York
tagline: The city that never sleeps, always inspires.
description: The city that never sleeps, with iconic landmarks and nightlife.
review: “A must-visit for every traveler.”

name: London
description: Historic city with royal palaces and world-class museums.
review: “So much history packed in one place!”

name: Sydney
description: Famous for the Opera House and stunning beaches.
review: “Loved the weather and beaches!”

name: Rome
description: Ancient city with ruins, art, and Italian cuisine.
review: “History comes alive here!”

name: Barcelona
description: Colorful city famous for unique architecture and vibrant culture.
review: “Colorful and lively city.”

name: Cape Town
description: Scenic city with mountains, beaches, and rich heritage.
review: “Nature and city in perfect harmony.”

name: Singapore
tagline: Clean streets, modern marvels, and rich culture.
description: Modern city-state with gardens and amazing food.
review: “Clean, green and exciting.”

name: Bali
description: Experience Bali’s tropical paradise, vibrant culture, and iconic beaches.
review: “Absolutely breathtaking! From the rice terraces to the spiritual temples, Bali is a dream come true.”

name: Bangkok
description: Explore Bangkok’s bustling street life, historic temples, and mouth-watering street food.
review: “Energetic, exciting, and full of flavor — a must-visit for foodies and culture lovers.”

name: Istanbul
description: Wander through ancient bazaars and beautiful mosques in this historic city.
review: “The history is unmatched. Loved Hagia Sophia and the Bosphorus views.”

name: India
description: Explore a land of festivals, flavors, spirituality, and natural beauty.
review: “Every region is unique. From the Himalayas to Kerala — a spiritual and sensory delight.”

name: Japan
description: From cherry blossoms to bullet trains, Japan is a perfect mix of old and new.
review: “Flawless public transport, rich culture, and beautiful landscapes — a 10/10 destination.”

name: Maldives
description: Relax in overwater villas and soak in the turquoise beauty of the Maldives.
review: “Unforgettable honeymoon experience! The waters were crystal clear and the sunsets surreal.”

name: Manali
description: Snow-capped mountains, pine forests, and peaceful getaways await in Manali.
review: “Perfect for a quick mountain retreat. The views and vibe are so refreshing!”

name: Korea
description: From Seoul’s nightlife to Jeju’s serenity, Korea is both fun and peaceful.
review: “Amazing people, clean cities, and addictive food. I want to go back already!”

name: America
description: Discover the diversity of America — from iconic cities to breathtaking national parks.
review: “Every state offers a new adventure. Grand Canyon, New York, and LA were personal highlights!”

name: China
description: Walk the Great Wall, visit ancient palaces, and experience dynamic cities.
review: “Blends ancient history with modern marvels — especially loved the food and temples!”
